violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements
package name similar to existing packages

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: Should be ok, but you will have to ask on Slack for a manual merge after the end of the three-day-period

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text: > The following dependencies do not have a [compat] entry that is upper-bounded and only includes a finite number of breaking releases: JSON3, MPI, OpenBLAS32
